item.title: 和今天的许多美国购物者一样，Cookie Monster 已经受够了通货紧缩，这个 "芝麻街 "卡通人物引起了国会山立法者的关注。
item.description:
Like many American shoppers today, Cookie Monster has had it with shrinkflation, with the "Sesame Street" character garnering attention from lawmakers on Capitol Hill. https://t.co/ucME3jFixk pic.twitter.com/IsCOj530mi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一名妇女分享了 12 月初发生的一起病毒事件的录像，当时她的丈夫在从犹他州飞往路易斯安那州的航班上被困在达美航空的洗手间里。幸运的是，机组人员和机长仅用了片刻时间就帮助这名男子脱困。
item.description:
A woman is sharing footage of a viral incident from early December in which her husband got trapped in a Delta restroom during a flight from Utah to Louisiana.

Luckily, flight crew and the captain were able to help free the man after only a few moments. pic.twitter.com/ksUfrvJezD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 超级星期二 "出口民调结果显示，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）都面临着挑战，包括特朗普和尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）选民之间广泛而实质性的差距：
item.description:
Even as they cruised toward nomination, Super Tuesday exit poll results showed challenges for Joe Biden and Donald Trump alike, including broad, substantive gaps between Trump and Nikki Haley voters.

Read more: https://t.co/4hvYrIqyy0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）预测，根据投票分析，前总统特朗普将赢得阿拉斯加州共和党党团会议。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Pres. Trump will win the Alaska Republican caucus based on analysis of the vote, ABC News projects. https://t.co/twnq1brjED

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 安德鲁-科莫（Andrew Cuomo）被国会小组委员会传唤，调查 COVID 时代对养老院的处理情况。
item.description:
Andrew Cuomo subpoenaed by congressional subcommittee investigating COVID-era handling of nursing homes. https://t.co/l0XQJuk4yH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 超级星期二之后，有一件事似乎很清楚：大选正式开始了：
item.description:
After Super Tuesday, one thing seems clear: The general election is officially on.

Here are five takeaways from the big day: https://t.co/H7jrs06cYL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 密苏里州的一项新法案将规定，学校教师或辅导员支持变性未成年人的社会转型属于重罪。
item.description:
A new Missouri bill would make it a felony offense for school teachers or counselors to support the social transitioning of a transgender minor.

The proposed law would also have a transgressor be placed on the sexual offender registry.https://t.co/ORV5EHE8Q1 pic.twitter.com/q2iyjJBxZT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 超级星期二是 11 月之前一年中最重要的选举日，当晚的选举结果基本可以预见，除了几个小意外。
item.description:
Super Tuesday — the biggest election day of the year until November — was a largely predictable affair, save for a couple minor surprises throughout the night. https://t.co/pWhe8M2Xku

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 国家公园管理局和国家樱花节的组织者说，3 月 23 日至 26 日是今年哥伦比亚特区潮汐盆地樱花盛开的预计日期。
item.description:
The National Park Service and organizers of the National Cherry Blossom Festival said March 23-26 are the projected peak bloom dates for the District of Columbia's Tidal Basin cherry blossom this year.https://t.co/QJKkXQdYxO pic.twitter.com/vhkHuAUmG6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 二月份在佛罗里达州克利尔沃特一个活动房屋公园发生的小型飞机坠毁事件造成三人死亡，目前已有新的细节浮出水面。
item.description:
New details have emerged in the February small plane crash at a Clearwater, Florida, mobile home park that left three dead.https://t.co/7ENPMZLvrg pic.twitter.com/ZMFHwbEA6U

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）预测，众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）和前道奇队球星史蒂夫-加维（Steve Garvey）将在 11 月角逐已故参议员黛安-范斯坦（Dianne Feinstein）的加州参议员席位。
item.description:
Rep. Adam Schiff and former Dodgers star Steve Garvey are set to compete in November for late Sen. Dianne Feinstein's California Senate seat, ABC News projects.@MattGutmanABC breaks down the race. https://t.co/P2Eq3uWgUj pic.twitter.com/J3Epdtn6rm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在 "超级星期二 "的初步出口民调中，北卡罗来纳州78%、加利福尼亚州69%和弗吉尼亚州68%的海利共和党总统初选选民表示，无论党内提名人是谁，他们都不愿表示支持。
item.description:
In preliminary exit polling from Super Tuesday, 78% of Haley voters in the North Carolina Republican presidential primary, 69% in California and 68% in Virginia said they were unwilling to voice support for the party's nominee whoever it is. https://t.co/Ji9UhUkQnr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据 ABC News 预测，共和党人 Young Kim 将在 11 月的加州众议院 CD40 选举中晋级大选：
item.description:
Republican Young Kim will advance to the general election in November in the race for California House CD40, ABC News projects.

Follow live Super Tuesday updates: https://t.co/Zq8OPUjewT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 周二，路易斯安那州州长杰夫-兰德里（Jeff Landry）签署了一系列法案，路易斯安那州成为全美打击犯罪最严厉的州之一：
item.description:
Louisiana on Tuesday became one of the toughest-on-crime states in the nation when Gov. Jeff Landry signed a series of bills.

Here's what to know: https://t.co/z8SGO9k0pe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据 ABC 新闻报道，共和党人史蒂夫-加维（Steve Garvey）和民主党人亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）将在加州参议院初选中晋级 11 月大选。
item.description:
JUST IN: Republican Steve Garvey and Democrat Adam Schiff will advance to the November election in the California Senate primary, ABC News projects. https://t.co/kRSim3TI9l pic.twitter.com/6e12s69hsU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 航拍镜头显示了密歇根州大火爆炸的后果，官方称一名 19 岁的年轻人在四分之一英里外丧生。消防官员说，一家电子烟分销公司发生的大火是他们多年来面临的最具挑战性的事件之一。
item.description:
Aerial footage shows the aftermath of the fiery explosion in Michigan that officials say killed a 19-year-old a quarter mile away.

Fire officials said the blaze at a vaping distribution company was one of the most challenging they've faced in years.https://t.co/MekBXIHPJY pic.twitter.com/pnJCFj2mnu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在 "超级星期二"，乔-拜登总统出人意料地在美属萨摩亚民主党党团会议上输给了企业家杰森-帕尔默。
item.description:
In a surprising upset on Super Tuesday, President Joe Biden lost the American Samoa Democratic caucuses to entrepreneur Jason Palmer.

The results mark Biden's first loss in the nominating race so far.

So who is Jason Palmer?https://t.co/S8YVE4uO2H

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统就 "超级星期二 "选举结果发表声明，鼓励选民 "捍卫我们的个人自由 "并投票：
item.description:
Pres. Joe Biden issued a statement on Super Tuesday results, encouraging voters to "stand up for our personal freedom" and vote.

More on Super Tuesday primaries: https://t.co/wloTFpldQ9 pic.twitter.com/JtDyyT8ZNt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普在 Mar-a-Lago 向支持者发表讲话："我们会赢得大选，因为我们别无选择。如果我们输掉选举，我们的国家就不复存在了"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump addresses supporters at Mar-a-Lago: “We’re gonna win this election because we have no choice. If we lose the election, we’re not gonna have a country left.” https://t.co/VotzsnJ1kQ pic.twitter.com/yeQ6SyB7h9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 前第一夫人米歇尔-奥巴马的办公室否认了她计划在 2024 年重返白宫的传言，称 "她不会竞选总统"。
item.description:
The office of former first lady Michelle Obama shut down rumors that she’s planning to return to the White House in 2024, saying that “she will not be running for president.” https://t.co/hOYU17fgYo pic.twitter.com/6hw85rDBJA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州诺克罗斯的执法部门称，他们在一个仓库中发现了 855 磅冰毒。
item.description:
Law enforcement in Norcross, Georgia, said they recovered 855 pounds of crystal meth found in a storage unit.

The street value of the drugs was estimated by authorities to be worth $1.5 million.https://t.co/501PKImdBM pic.twitter.com/k55YqoYzst

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在得克萨斯州，参议员特德-克鲁兹（Ted Cruz）在竞选连任中赢得了共和党提名，美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）预测，民主党众议员科林-艾尔雷德（Colin Allred）赢得了党内提名，有机会取代克鲁兹。
item.description:
In Texas, Sen. Ted Cruz won the GOP nomination in his reelection bid, ABC News projects.

Democratic Rep. Colin Allred won his party's nomination for the chance to unseat Cruz, ABC News also projects.https://t.co/sosvUPNjJf pic.twitter.com/HFSitkAkwQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据美国广播公司新闻报道，在美属萨摩亚民主党党团会议上，鲜为人知的候选人杰森-帕尔默（Jason Palmer）击败了总统拜登。
item.description:
Little-known candidate Jason Palmer defeated Pres. Biden in the American Samoa Democratic caucuses, ABC News reports, based on a call to the Democratic Party chair. https://t.co/NSAuEQH6HR pic.twitter.com/MewRqKhKwd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024
